articles.author: Lateshia Beachum, Annabelle Timsit, Rachel Pannett
articles.title: Coronavirus live updates: US opens borders to 33 countries as Europe cases surge - The Washington Post
articles.description: Most of the 33 previously banned countries are in Europe, a region the WHO recently declared as the latest “epicenter” of the pandemic.
articles.content:
First lady Jill Biden spoke to families Monday in front of a sign with the words You did it! to celebrate the arrival of vaccines for some of the youngest Americans.
They are great, effective and fr… [+2119 chars]
